Mothers Day For Wonderful Wife Vase of Flowers Card

Hot Deals! Mothers Day For Wonderful Wife Vase of Flowers Card – Mothers Day Cards Mothers Day For Wonderful Wife Vase of Flowers Card products are in stock Mothers Day For Wonderful Wife Vase of Flowers Card quality products and have the highest number of reviews in the same categoryThis pretty, contemporary floral Mother’s Day greeting card for your wife features a bouquet of pink, blue and white flowers in a pale blue vase on a dark blue background. The greeting on the front cover is, ‘To my wonderful Wife’!’ in white handwriting script at the top. Below the vase of flowers, it says, ‘With lots of love on ‘ and then ‘MOTHER’S DAY!’ in a decorative lettering. The inside message is just a suggestion and you can easily change it or delete it altogether if you prefer a ‘blank inside’ card. Price:$4.42
